title: Linux uuto Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the uuto command in Linux, learn how to send and receive files securely, and discover practical use cases for this powerful communication tool.

meta.title: Linux uuto Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the uuto command in Linux, learn how to send and receive files securely, and discover practical use cases for this powerful communication tool.
meta.keywords: Linux, uuto, file transfer, secure communication, networking, command line, practical examples

verify.name: Verify the uuto command usage
verify.hint: Make sure you have used the `uuto` command correctly to send the `example.txt` file to the remote user `remote_user@remote_host`.

steps.title: Sending Files Using the uuto Command

verify.name: Verify the uuto command usage for file transfer
verify.hint: Make sure you have used the `uuto` command correctly to send the `example.txt` file to the remote user `remote_user@remote_host`.

steps.title: Receiving Files with the uuto Command

verify.name: Verify the uupick command usage for file reception
verify.hint: Make sure you have used the `uupick` command correctly to retrieve the `example.txt` file that was sent to your system.
